name: Tri-Runner
description:
Outline: Jacob is bold enough to not slow down as he always urges himself forward. The player must react to all incoming obstacles before he hits them by switching colored elements, maybe even element combinations. The level is a gauntlet to navigate from left to right. Jacob must find his way through the level in order to take the throne for himself.

  • Play the greatest hero of them all, a peasant.
  • Make tough choices like, Green, Blue, or Red.
  • Test your reflexes as an onslaught approaches you.
  • Establish Democracy… probably.
  • Combine the elements to ascend to the throne.
  • Run for dear life.
